Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some 95th-bound Red Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier sick customer on a train at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some 95th-bound Red Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier sick customer on a train at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
